acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

getCurrentEpoch().details: Get the current epoch based on the current block timestamp

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._allowZeroAddress: If set to true, does not throw if the resolved address is `address(0)`.
params._name: Name whose address is to be resolved.

returns._0: Address associated with the given name.

params._allowZeroAddress: If set to true, does not throw if the resolved address is `address(0)`.
params._name: Name whose address is to be resolved.

returns._0: Address associated with the given name on the specified chain.

stake(address,uint256).details: Deposits MXC token to be used as bonds.

params._amount: The amount of token to deposit.

stakingCalculateRewardDebt(address).details: Calculate the debt reward owed to a user

returns._0: The debt reward owed to the user

stakingClaimReward().details: User claims their accumulated interest and transfers it to their wallet.

stakingDepositReward().details: System deposits reward to all users based on their stake.

stakingSlashing(address,uint256).details: Slash a user's bond balance. Dishonest behavior and failure to meet online rate targets during the period

stakingWithdrawal().details: User completes the withdrawal after the lock period

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

paused().notice: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

resolve(bytes32,bool).notice: Resolves a name to its address deployed on this chain.

resolve(uint64,bytes32,bool).notice: Resolves a name to its address deployed on a specified chain.
